title: Christie’s auction showcases style of centenarian fashion muse Iris Apfel
description: Lots include her trademark oversize glasses as well as outfits from Miu Miu, Dior and lifesize ostrich sculptureIris Apfel, perhaps the world’s first centenarian style icon, died last year at the age of 102. Now her clothes, art and furniture are set to be sold at Christie’s later this month in an online auction titled Unapologetically Iris.Anyone familiar with Apfel and her “more is more” style would know that it began with her trademark owl-like glasses. There are 18 pairs for sale here, with square, round and sparkly designs included. Continue reading...
author: Lauren Cochrane

title: How ‘ins and outs’ are defining the look of 2025
description: Resolutions are so last year. Instead, the latest fashion trends, life goals and dating rules are playing out on the battleground of viral listicles. Plus: your wardrobe dilemmas solvedRepeating outfits: in. People pleasing: out. Paying with cash: in. Photo dumps: out. A quick trawl through social media and it is evident that for 2025, traditional new year resolution lists are out and “ins and outs” lists are, er, in.These listicles do exactly what their title suggests, demarcating everything from specific items of clothing to wider food trends and dating rules into two opposing grids. On TikTok the hashtag “ins and outs” has quickly acquired more than 44,000 posts. Unlike new year resolutions, which tend to be specific goals, “ins and outs” act as a barometer of cool. Continue reading...

title: Birkenstock's Viral Clogs Got a Wintry Update - and They Feel Like Cozy House Slippers
description: If you're like me and you couldn't find a pair of Birkenstock's Boston Soft Footbed Clogs in your preferred size and color a couple of seasons ago, it may have been for the best. Turns out, the shearling-lined fall- and winter-friendly iteration of the brand's popular clog is softer, cozier, and more comfortable than the Boston Soft Footbed Clogs. I pounced on buying Birkenstock's Boston Genuine Shearling Lined Clogs ($175) as soon as they appeared in Nordstrom's new arrivals section, and I've been wearing them nonstop. What I Love About Birkenstock's Shearling-Lined Clogs They feel like a fuzzy slipper but have the ergonomic design and comfortable yet sturdy footbed that Birkenstock's Boston clogs are known for. I was initially worried that the shearling lining might make my feet sweat, but unlike synthetic versions, genuine shearling is naturally temperature-regulating. On warmer days or when I quickly need to slip into something, I've worn them barefoot, but they also manage to look cool with a quarter sock on chillier days. When our editor reviewed the version without shearling, she was expecting them to be comfortable but was surprised by how versatile they are as well. I've been thrilled to discover the same thing as I've thrown these shearling-lined mules on with everything from leggings and sweats to barrel jeans and even a jumpsuit. As far as convenience goes, I love that I can put them on hands-free. As a mom of two little ones and a brand-new puppy, they've become my go-to for 6 a.m. potty breaks when I'm half-asleep and my hands are occupied with a leash, treats, and a squirming pup. What's Worth Noting About Birkenstock's Shearling-Lined Clogs At $175, they're an investment and pricier than Birkenstock's Boston Soft Footbed Clogs, but the shearling is a worthy upgrade. I opted for the taupe color which has a tonal aesthetic with the matching suede and shearling. I like that the color isn't too light or dark, but I was concerned about getting them stained with dirt and water. Amazingly enough, they still look practically new despite how much I've been wearing them. I've gotten clumps of dirt on them but have been able to easily brush the dirt off. I've even gotten caught in an unexpected sprinkle and the raindrops didn't stain the suede either. Who Are Birkenstock's Shearling-Lined Clogs Best For? Whether you want a pair of shoes that are comfortable and easy or are more concerned with crafting an effortless aesthetic, you'll be equally pleased. If you have sheepskins draped over furniture or a favorite pair of shearling-lined boots, these versatile shoes are a no-brainer. Additional Details About Birkenstock's Shearling-Lined Clogs If you're between sizes, order the next size up. These are built on a unisex shoe construction, but the sizes reflect women's shoe sizes. They have an adjustable strap with a buckle closure. They have a contoured footbed with arch support. Where Are Birkenstock's Shearling-Lined Clogs Available? You can buy these clogs at Nordstrom, Amazon, and Birkenstock. Rating: Angela Elias (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping. In her former roles at PS, she led the relaunch of its Latine identity and family-focused verticals, directed its Home vertical, and hosted shopping segments. She has nearly 15 years of experience working in the lifestyle space as a writer, editor, content strategist, director, on-camera talent, and publicist.
author: Angela Elias

title: The 28 Best Sneakers For Women - From Adidas Sambas to Hoka Trainers
description: Being comfortable in your own shoes never goes out of style, so investing in a top-tier sneaker collection is always a smart idea. When it comes to picking out the best sneakers, we look for a few key elements: good sneaker design, quality materials, and the perfect fit - because who wants to be uncomfortable? Our editors test out so many different types of shoes to provide you with the best product recommendations, and we boast a particular expertise on sneakers (call us sneakerheads, if you will). Love some casual, everyday sneakers? We've got you covered. Prefer sportier, performance sneakers for working out? We found those, too. And of course, if you're looking for cute sneakers that you can dress up for work, we've tried our fair share. To help you find the best women's sneakers to add to your wardrobe, we enlisted our expert editors, along with a handful of celebrities we've interviewed - like Kate Hudson, Ashley Graham, and Ayesha Curry - for their masterful recommendations of the best women's sneakers for 2025. These picks cover a range of styles, so you're bound to find your perfect shoe. What to Look For in the Best Women's Sneakers Whether you want something modern and playful or sleek and classic, we've uncovered the best of the best trending this year, and we'll tell you all the reasons we love these stylish sneakers. The styles fall into a number of different design categories, including: best trendy sneakers, best sustainable sneakers, best athletic sneakers, best high-top sneakers, best white sneakers, best classic sneakers, and best sneakers for walking. At the moment, fashion forecasters predict sporty dad sneakers will continue to be big throughout 2025 - particularly styles from brands like New Balance and Adidas. In an homage to the '90s and early aughts, chunky platform sneakers are also being embraced by stylists and celebrities alike - as showcased via New York Fashion Week street style. And the newly debuted Reebok Classic AZ Shoes are primed to be the hottest everyday sneaker this year, thanks to its neutral palette that's easy to style with a range of outfits. Our own sneaker recommendations tout brands like Nike, Converse, Puma, and more. Word of advice: your shoe closet is about to get a whole lot fuller, so make some extra room. Keep reading to shop our guide to the best sneakers for women.
author: Kyley Warren

title: Last Chance To Shop: Reformation’s Winter Sale Is Now Up To 70% Off
description: .disclaimer{width:90%;margin-bottom:1rem}.disclaimer__lines{width:100%;margin:0 auto;border-bottom:1px solid #999;padding:0;max-width:150px}.disclaimer__copy{width:100%;max-width:355px;font-family:Brown Regular,sans-serif;font-size:.9rem;font-weight:300;line-height:1.3em;color:#333;padding:0 0 .4rem;margin:1rem auto;text-align:center} All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission. What better way to celebrate the chilly season than with the beloved winter Reformation sale? The reader-favorite dress destination’s biggest markdown event has arrived with a bang: For a limited time, score up to 70% off select styles, from luxe party dresses and skirts to polished pants and cozy-cute cardigans (both of which are s’cute for the office or a dinner date). These discounts demand the online equivalent of an awkward, arms-flailing speed walk — scrolling with purpose and maybe a little panic. So, get moving and scoop up favorites fast, plus free shipping. The cutest ‘fits won’t wait, and neither should you. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 70% Off Reformation Coats & Jackets Timeless wool coats, ladylike jackets, quiet luxury toppers — Reformation’s on-sale outerwear selection is filled with modern classics. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 70% Off Reformation Sweaters From oversized cashmere polos to a scarf-adorned crewneck, Reformation’s knits deliver in quality and trend appeal. Secure your cozy winter favorites before they’re gone for good. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 70% Off Reformation Dresses It wouldn’t be a Reformation sale without marked-down dresses. Think of it as a treasure trove of minis, midis, and maxis — from lustrous party-ready gowns to fitted sweater styles perfect for casual plans. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 70% Off Reformation Pants & Skirts Bold silk pants are a seasonal “It” item, but you can also find low-rise trousers, sheer skirts, and a button-front maxi practically begging to be styled with over-the-knee boots at the Reformation sale. Dial them up for a party or temper with a chunky knit and flats for the office. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 70% Off Reformation Tops & Tees Reformation does silky boho blouses and second-skin tops with asymmetrical details like no other. Its on-sale edit is all about transitional statement pieces — perfect under a jacket by day and solo with sculptural earrings for date night. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 70% Off Reformation Denim There’s no such thing as too much denim — especially from Reformation. The sale is stacked with fresh takes on the classics, from black and dark indigo washes to a studded jacket and the sleekest mini dress for a prim edge. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 70% Off Reformation Shoes Take your pick from Reformation’s on-sale shoe lineup, where trends and timelessness meet. Ballet flats, slingbacks, kitten heels, and knee-high boots (in a delectable espresso brown) are all here — the finishing touch for any winter look. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 70% Off Reformation Bags Reformation’s on-sale bags are seriously good. You have supple leather buckets with the perfect slouch, a sleek snake-print shoulder bag with sculptural hardware detailing, and a rhinestone-adorned mesh mini made for party nights — plus much more. author: Mercedes Viera

title: 17 Outfit Ideas To Inspire Your 2025 Personal Style
description: Ever stand in front of your jam-packed closet, staring at more than enough clothing options, and think: I have nothing to wear? Same. But perhaps the issue isn’t that you’re out of viable outfit choices. You just need a fresh dose of inspiration — say: 2025 outfit ideas — to help you see your wardrobe in a new way. That’s where Outfit Dump comes in. We supply you with enough ideas to fuel your style until the next drop comes along.  Here’s a radical thought: You don’t have to approach a new year intending to completely reinvent your life — especially not when it comes to fashion. Chances are, you already know what you like, with a closet’s worth of well-curated pieces to prove it. If you’re stuck in a style rut (we’ve all been there), you probably just need somewhere to look for inspiration to approach your existing wardrobe with a refreshed perspective and to help you understand your gaps better for when you do need to add new pieces.Well, you’re in luck: we have that inspiration for you right here. We’ve searched our Instagram feeds far and wide to find a selection of stylish, covetable outfits to help inspire your 2025 style. Ahead, you’ll find chic takes on cozy winterwear, office-appropriate suiting, bold animal prints and colors, and runway-approved trends to help you decide what to wear this year.2025 Outfit Idea: Suits With a Twist To up your officewear game in 2025, incorporate unexpected twists into your suiting — think oversized ‘fits with soft and loose garments, or mismatched separates, like seen on Emma Chamberlain here. 2025 Outfit Idea: Velvet To start the new year, we’re gravitating towards plush textural pieces that look luxe and make us feel good. The velvet set pictured here does exactly that — plus, its loose fit makes it another great play on the suit-with-a-twist concept.  2025 Outfit Idea: Suede Is velvet a bit too over the top for your style vibe? That’s okay — that’s what suede is for.2025 Outfit Idea: Animal Print If 2024 was the year of leopard print, what will 2025 bring? We’ll still be playing with animal prints of all kinds, like the brushed cow prints pictured here. 2025 Outfit Idea: Getting Sporty Elevated athletic style is in for 2025, and a simple way to ease yourself into the aesthetic is with a striped rugby sweater (which has already been having a moment). The baseball cap is optional but highly encouraged. 2025 Outfit Idea: Getting Sporty Are you already comfortable with the rugby sweater trend, but still want to get into the sporty look? Try a windbreaker or racing jacket, and don’t be afraid to experiment with dressing your chosen piece up. 2025 Outfit Idea: Oversized Scarf When you have to bundle up, an oversized scarf makes it feel like you’ve actually put together a complete look and aren’t just hiding it. 2025 Outfit Idea: Long Coat And if you do have to bundle up and want to skip the scarf, let a full-length wool coat become the centerpiece of your outfit.2025 Outfit Idea: Cape If the runways have anything to say about it, capes and draped pieces — such as hybrid dresses and cardigans — will be taking on new life in 2025.2025 Outfit Idea: Burgundy Because we’re not ready to leave the warmth and richness of burgundy red behind in 2024. Style it with accent pieces, like tights or a scarf, or go head-to-toe. 2025 Outfit Idea: Skirt Over Pants Yes, wearing a skirt over pants is back again, and we’re ready to embrace it with open arms (we think). 2025 Outfit Idea: Sheer Clothing The sheer trend is stronger than ever. Consider different layering techniques: What will you allow to peek through from beneath your sheer pieces, and what will you wear over them (an oversized blazer on top of a flowing sheer maxi skirt, like pictured here, for example?) while still getting some of the sexy effect? 2025 Outfit Idea: Denim + Color How can you wear a Canadian tuxedo without feeling like you're cosplaying Britney and Justin? Double up your favorite jeans and denim top, then put on a vibrant coat overtop and an equally bold pair of shoes to match. 2025 Outfit Idea: Mocha Mousse Borrow some style inspo from Pantone and don its 2025 Color of the Year, Mocha Mousse. The warm light brown shade will last in your closet long past when its Pantone crown has been passed on. 2025 Outfit Idea: Vibrant Hues Not into neutrals? Then don’t shy away from color! Bright hues like frog green, marigold, and periwinkle are also on the rise this year. You don’t have to mix and match neon shades, like in this example, but also: Why not go for it, right?2025 Outfit Idea: Colorblocked Sweater We’re of the opinion that you can never have enough chunky sweaters, and if you’re anything like us, most of yours are probably in reliable neutral shades. Why not add some color to your knitwear rotation?2025 Outfit Idea: Lady-Like Details Ladylike, ultra-femme details remain dominant, leaving room to style outfits that are soft, pretty, elegant — whatever that may look like for you. If you’re looking for ideas, try bubble hems, ruffles, or frilled collars. Like what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?26 Fall Outfit Ideas To Embrace Cooler WeatherWinter Wedding Guest Outfits Including Jumpsuits30 Best Winter Dresses For Parties, Work & More
author: Patricia Karounos
